Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a 370-foot home run off Rays pitcher Shane Baz in the first inning, giving the Phillies an early 2-0 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: MLB fans reacted positively to Castellanos hitting a home run on 9/11, continuing a trend of homering on tragedies and major events.
Others: Edwin Uceta of the Tampa Bay Rays was suspended for three games after hitting Nick Castellanos with a pitch, though the suspension was later reduced to two games. Tampa Bay Rays manager Kevin Cash was also suspended for one game.
